column4: any reason why a ndiswrapper driver wouldn't work with the network discovery thing that's on the panel by default?
wireless networking is such a mish-mash anything is possible!
well is there any configs I can look at to maybe solve the problem? I'm able to connect to the network... but it doesn't seem to like DHCPing the address... if I use dhclient manually it works
I have no idea, sorry. Google is your friend... sometimes!
